MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH17 postcode area of Edinburgh, We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:59pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the local substation and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:50 PM on Monday, 04 January 2021.
